ellipse.style: stroke: rgb(0, 0, 0); paint-order: fill; stroke-width: 1; fill: rgb(103, 20, 220);
stroke: rgb(0, 0, 0); paint-order: fill; fill: rgb(103, 20, 220);
stroke: rgb(0, 0, 0); paint-order: fill; stroke-width: 1; fill: rgb(91, 22, 188); stroke-opacity: 0;
fill: rgb(216, 216, 216); stroke: rgb(239, 12, 12); stroke-miterlimit: 4.83; stroke-width: 8px; fill-opacity: 0;
